isis.stitle: AIR CONDITIONING - HEATER SYSTEM: 2000, 4000, AND 8000 - Before 12/06/1994 - COMPONENTS - CONTROL UNIT, SWITCH AND CABLES

svcproc.title: CONTROL UNIT, SWITCH AND CABLES
svcproc.para: All major functions of the A/C-Heater system are controlled from the cab control assembly ( Figure 7). It includes three rotary knobs and an "ON/OFF" push button A/C switch. The center knob operates the blend door and water valve. The left knob controls the split between defrost and cab air by closing and opening a door located in the right duct assembly. The right knob is the fan switch and has three settings: LOW, MEDIUM and HIGH.

calloutgroup.callout1: 4. AIR CONDITIONING BUTTON (NOT WITH HEATER ONLY UNITS)

svcproc.para: The driver floor dump door is controlled from the instrument panel just above the ash tray. The passenger heat dump (both systems) is fixed open.
